title: Interpretation of seeing tight hugs in a dream

preview.html: Many people wonder about the interpretation of seeing tight hugs in a dream when one feels love towards another person. He wants to express this love in many ways, and hugging is one of the manifestations through which each of us can express our intense love for others, but what does hugging mean in a dream? What does it mean for a dreamer to see in his dream that he is hugging or hating a stranger? We will learn the answers to these questions in detail through the lines of this article in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing tight embraces in a dream Dream interpretation scholars say that dreaming of close embraces indicates that the dreamer will soon achieve many of the achievements and desires that he desired. A tight embrace in a dream indicates the dreamer’s repetitive thinking In attachment, separation, and fear of this idea. An unmarried girl hugging her deceased parents in a dream symbolizes a feeling of loneliness, extreme fear in reality, and her inability to plan for her future. Among the visions with a good interpretation is the dream of a man embracing a woman he does not know. This vision indicates the end of all the difficulties that the dreamer is suffering from and gaining a lot for the sake of living. Interpretation of a dream about embracing someone I know: The scholar Muhammad bin Sirin says: The embrace in the dream is evidence that God Almighty will bless the dreamer and whoever he embraces in life. Embracing in a dream symbolizes that There are many similarities between the dreamer and the person he hugged in his dream. Embracing a loved one who is absent from the dreamer in a dream is a sign of the imminent return of that absent person. To dream that you are hugging a familiar person and you feel sadness and pain during that hug means that the dreamer will separate from the person who Hug him, whether the relationship between them is engagement, marriage, or friendship. When someone sees in his dream that he is hugging someone, but without feelings. This means that the dreamer will be called a hypocrite and will show the opposite of what he is hiding. Seeing someone embracing and being afraid of him is an indication that the dreamer is afraid of his father in reality. Dreaming about laughing during an embrace is a praiseworthy dream because it indicates that the dreamer will soon succeed in his studies, while other scholars have interpreted it However, it is an indication that the dreamer is going through difficult and sudden circumstances that make him cry. If someone sees in a dream that he is hugging his opponent. His dream indicated that the rivalry between them would soon end. When one dreams that he is hugging someone and wrapping his arm around him. This is evidence that God will grant him victory and glorify his fate, but if it is a human being who wrapped his arms around the dreamer. This means that the dreamer will suffer defeat or loss. A short hug in a dream symbolizes that the relationship between the dreamer and the person he hugged will not last long, but if the hug is long, this indicates that the love between them will continue. Interpretation of dreams hugging someone I do not knowIf one dreams that he is hugging Someone he doesn't know. His vision indicated that the fortuneteller would participate with this person in some work that would strengthen the relationship between them. Interpretation of a dream about hugging and crying: Whoever sees in a dream that he is hugging someone and crying with tears. His vision showed that God Almighty would make him happy and relieve him of all his worries.And there

title: Interpretation of a dream about green according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The green color in a dream indicates faith and a halal life, and other interpretations that we will explain to a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, such as wearing the green color and seeing a green shirt, pants, shirt, dress, and car. A shawl or green hair dye, etc. Seeing the color green is one of the very beautiful and wonderful dreams. It is one of the visions that we often see in our dreams and afflicts the dreamer with a great state of happiness and great joy, as the green color usually symbolizes goodness and great kindness in our daily lives. Interpretation of the color green in Seeing the color green in a dream announces the strength of a person’s faith and expresses that the dreamer is a religious, faithful and conscientious person, who avoids prohibitions, is close to what is permitted and lives accordingly. The green color in a dream is considered a symbol of nature and life and in the dream it also symbolizes growth, stability and attention. The green color in The dreamer’s dream warns the dreamer of what he may encounter in his life, depending on the nature of the dream. Whoever finds himself in a green pasture and is not harmed, this is a neutral dream that does not portend harm. Whoever eats green food, especially vegetables, seeks recovery, comfort, and happiness, and whoever loses the green thing and searches for it for a long time and does not If he finds it, he lacks stability, comfort, and reassurance. Seeing things in green without their primary color is an indication of the desire for stability. And you should be careful if you find yourself in green in a dream, or if you receive a green gift, as everyone who finds himself in a meadow It has lost its natural green color. Green in a dream is the color of good tidings and the arrival of “spring” in the dreamer’s life, and it is the color of hope. As for the message that green sends in a dream, it is: calm and abundant kindness. As for seeing white and green together in a dream, it means that you are going through happy circumstances. The green color in our dreams expresses fertile and happy days or years because it is the color that nature enjoys in the spring and covers meadows, farms, forests, and orchards. The green color in a dream expresses cognitive or material achievements and is one of the indicators of victory and success in this world. Aside from dreams, whoever wears green removes stress and attachment from himself and feels energetic and renewed due to the reflection of this color in the soul. Dyeing hair green in a dream shows A person who opens a small business and makes ends meet without needing anyone. A vision that promises the end of debts is a sign that life will continue without problems, even if he does not feel that the money in his hand is sufficient, and with gratitude his heart is reassured. Seeing a green branch from a tree means that this person will live a beautiful life and have a blessed and abundant life, and thus he will be satisfied About his situation and raising wonderful children and in return for the effort he puts into them, you will find fulfillment and goodness. Wearing green shoes in a dream focuses on moral feelings and following religious methods in his life in general, and the vision may indicate marriage to a person with these characteristics. Regarding trousers

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about wearing a diamond ring for a single woman from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing and interpreting a dream about wearing a diamond ring for a single woman is a vision that carries many connotations, knowing that the interpretation varies from one girl to another depending on her condition and the details of the dream in addition to the material from which the ring was made. Today, we will study with you the most important interpretations of the dream by the great interpreters. Interpretation of the dream of wearing a diamond ring for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of the dream of wearing a diamond ring for unmarried women? If the dreamer is not engaged at the time of the dream, then the dream foretells her imminent engagement and will be She is happy with that, but if she is engaged, then her seeing the diamond ring shows her fiancé’s love for her and his fulfillment. Engagement in marriage.For an unmarried woman to see that the ring she wears on her hand is broken or lost, the dream indicates that her love story is not complete and she must have the strength to get through the coming days, even if they are tight, which indicates that she will. Go. Through a financial crisis and disagreements with her fiancé. Some commentators believe that the material that makes up the ring shows many clues. Whoever sees one of her friends taking the ring from her, this indicates hatred and resentment, and whoever sees her friend giving her a diamond ring, the dream indicates True friendship and the love that a friend has for her. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about wearing an unmarried woman’s diamond ring? If she sees in her dream that a man gives her a diamond ring and meets him, then the dream shows her marriage to him, and the ring in an unmarried woman’s dream shows that she You will reach a prominent position and will be interesting to them. Around her. A large ring in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the fulfillment of the aspirations she seeks, and if the dreamer sees the dream during a period in which she feels sad and depressed, then the dream indicates the end of this period of her life forever. Ibn Sirin believes that the diamond ring symbolizes wealth and abundance. Of the money that the girl will receive in her coming days, and gifting it to her shows the great status that someone has for her. The larger and luxurious the ring is, the more she will marry a wealthy man who enjoys prestige and power in the place where she lives. We also mentioned that the material from which the ring is made It affects the interpretation of the vision. A ring made of diamonds or gold indicates marriage to a single person, while a silver ring shows engagement, and iron symbolizes the dreamer’s passage. A period full of problems and judgments, while plastic or any cheap metal indicates that the girl will marry a man with limited income. An Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just write. Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. The most important interpretations of a dream about wearing A diamond ring for a single woman: I dreamed that I was wearing a diamond ring. Imam Al-Sadiq says that the appearance of a diamond ring in a woman’s dream indicates that she will give birth to a healthy female. As for someone who sees herself wearing a gold ring, this indicates in the dream that she has given birth to a boy, whereas if she sees herself wearing a narrow ring and is unable On removing it m

title: Interpretation of a dream about kneading dough in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What did the interpreters say about the interpretation of the dream of kneading dough? The interpretation of the dream of kneading dough in a dream can be bad or good, depending on the dreamer's method of kneading the dough, and whether he was tired when kneading or was able to do it effortlessly, and the color of the dough in a dream has a strong meaning, and to learn in detail the meaning of the dream, you should read the following. You have a dream that confuses you, you are waiting for it .. Google Egyptian site for interpreting dreams Interpretation of the dream of kneading dough The merchant's dream that he is kneading dough in a dream is evidence of his readiness to participate in a deal, competition or new business project, and according to the condition of the dough in the dream, we will know whether he will win the competition or not? That the jurists said that the dough is easy to ferment and the dreamer feels that it is firm and does not hurt his hand, and as long as he leaves it, his life will be smooth and free of suffering and he will reach his profession and material. Pursuits. If the dough fills the dreamer's hand and between his fingers, so that he loses control because it has become more than usual, and therefore it is not suitable for use in making any type of baked goods, especially bread, then the dreamer fails at work or in the work he was already preparing for. Clean dough in a dream is evidence of the purity of the dreamer's heart and his good behavior, as he only does good behavior and works only in lawful professions and therefore will only be given lawful money. If the fortune teller kneads the dough and after a short while finds it kneaded and ready for preparation or shaping, then the dream is interpreted as a quick and semi-sustainable livelihood, and if the dreamer expects discoveries in his life, especially in work or money, then he will get what he wants and God will comfort him. In addition, seeing yeast is evidence that the dreamer has reached the desire he sought, and the things that were previously planned will come true, God willing. As for if the dreamer kneads the dough and lets it rise, but waits for a long time and does not knead the dough, and thus the dreamer could not do what he wants from making bread or pies, and wakes up sad, then the vision indicates that he will wait a long time in his life until he achieves his ambitions, and he said Commentators say that this scene shows many difficulties in collecting money. When an unemployed man sees dough that has not risen, he suffers from poverty, and the vision warns him that his livelihood will not come quickly, but will be delayed a little, but God's relief is near in all cases. Interpretation of a dream about kneading dough by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said that if the dreamer sees himself kneading white dough and things go very smoothly in the dream, he will be happy in his life because of the abundance of his money and the abundance of livelihood that God gives him will be due to his good intentions and his distance from sins. And if the dreamer kneads the dough in a dream, cuts it into equal and small pieces, puts these pieces side by side and prepares to put them in the oven until they are cooked and ready to eat, then the vision shows that he is a careful person and does not spend money on useless things, and since he manages his financial aspects in a precise manner, he can become rich later because he preserves the blessing of money that God has given him. If the dreamer kneads dough in a dream,

title: I know the interpretation of a dream about clay from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about mud Mud is what results from mixing water with soil and can be made by a person to use it in many arts to earn money or the Creator created it during rainfall, and the dream of mud has many meanings for dreamers that differ from one person to another and according to many specific cases. In this article, there are a group of the most important interpretations that will clarify many of the mysterious meanings for us to get to know. Interpretation of a dream about mud Seeing the dreamer with mud in a dream and he is dirty with it in every part of his body is a sign of the approaching date of his meeting with his Lord and he must prepare well so that it does not fill with cracks. And then he repents, and if a person sees mud in his sleep and walks in it, this is evidence of his exposure to many bad events in his life during the following period and his entry into a state of severe depression as a result and his condition has become much worse. If the dreamer sees mud in his dream and its smell is bad, this is evidence of his doing many wrong actions that will lead to his death to a large extent if he does not stop them immediately. If a man sees mud in his dream. This may represent his exposure to a very serious illness that will soon make him bedridden for a very long time. Interpretation of a dream about mud by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision of mud in a dream as a sign that he is very stubborn and does not give up, so that he can achieve his goal regardless of the cost and his determination, so that he can achieve his goal, and if a person sees during his sleep that he is pouring clay and making useful tools, he will achieve many overwhelming achievements in his work during the coming period and enable him to reach the prestigious position that he has long sought. If the dreamer sees in his dream that the clay is shaped into the shape of people, this is a sign of his very shaken self-confidence, which makes him afraid of every new step he is about to take because he cannot bear it. Any of its consequences, and if a man sees in his dream that he is walking with difficulty in the mud, this indicates the many obstacles that will stand in his way in the coming period. The Secrets of Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just type a site about the secrets of dream interpretation, search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about mud for a single woman An unmarried woman who sees mud in a dream is a sign that she has many bad habits that make others feel very sad about her, as she does not keep secrets and does not care about returning the money entrusted to her to their owners. She has to fulfill her desires and suffers from many difficulties during that, which makes her very exhausted. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is running in the mud, this indicates that she is dealing with the pressures surrounding her in a very wrong way, as in the dream there is mud on her clothes, which indicates the spread of bad gossip about her as a result of her committing many corrupt acts in public places without shame. Interpretation of a dream about mud for a married woman A married woman's dream of mud in a dream, and her children do not play with it, is evidence that her husband will receive a lot of kindness and sustenance from

title: Interpretation of seeing an airplane in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an airplane by Ibn Sirin: Dreaming about traveling by airplane indicates a quick response to a request. Seeing an airplane in the sky means that this person will obtain a high position in his work. Inside the airplane is a dream that indicates the wealth and riches that the dreamer will have. Seeing an airplane in a dream indicates achieving all goals. A sick person who dreams that he is boarding a plane will die. Sometimes boarding a plane is a sign of piety and uprightness in life. Whoever sees in his dream that he is throwing stones at the plane, he is throwing stones at some intellectual women. Interpretation of a dream about an plane according to Al-Nabulsi in a dream: Owning a plane in a dream indicates commitment and responsibility. Whoever sees it If one sees that he is flying a plane, this indicates that the person is confident in himself. He saw many airplanes in a dream, then corruption will spread in the city he is in. Anyone who dreams of extinguishing an airplane fire will escape financial losses that may lead to bankruptcy. Interpretation of seeing an airplane for single peopleSeeing an airplane inside a dreamFor an unmarried girl, it means marriage and engagement soon. title: What is the interpretation of a dream that my hair is long according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: I dreamed that my hair was long. There is no doubt that long hair is loved by many women, and some men tend toward long hair. As for the world of dreams, long hair contains associations and meanings that may seem strange to some, so we find that seeing it can be disliked in several cases, while in several other cases it deserves praise, and in this article we look at this topic with more details and explanations. I dreamed that My hair is long. Seeing long hair indicates goodness, abundance of sustenance, and abundance of living, and among its symbols are adornment, adornment, and showing off. Long hair for men is evidence of improving living conditions and enjoying God’s protection and grace. If the hair is longer than usual, then these debts will accumulate on him and dissolve in his money and worries. That overwhelms him. One of the indications of long hair is that it indicates long lineage and good offspring, and long hair is good news of earning a livelihood and abundant money and gains. Whoever sees that he cuts his body hair because of its excessive length, he will pay what he owes and get rid of the worries of the world and the troubles of life. I dreamed that my hair was Long by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that long hair is the best for women, and it is a symbol of adornment, care, and prestige, and seeing it promises you good and abundant sustenance, and it also indicates a life of luxury, an increase in the world, and the enjoyment of luxury and health. And longevity. To see long, soft and silky hair symbolizes ease, a change in status, and an increase in money. One can earn money from his boss, and whoever sees her long hair, she is happy with her marital life, whether she is single or married. Long hair can be a sign of anxiety, distress, and bad condition. If it does not suit its owner or is not accustomed to it, then in this case it expresses the aggravation of debts and the succession of worries and crises. Long white hair indicates poverty, restlessness, and debt, and whoever sees his beard hair long, it indicates longevity and blessed health. I dreamed that I had long hair for single people. Hair Long hair in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the dreamer’s superiority in her life and her ability to achieve her goals and realize her goals and aspirations. This vision also indicates hearing good news and hope, obtaining goodness and blessings, and also leads to a close relationship, such as an engagement. Long hair symbolizes the dreamer’s liberation. Of problems and worries and his ability to overcome the problems and difficulties that stand in his way, control matters and make the right decisions. Interpretation of a dream about having long, soft hair for a single woman. Long, soft hair in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that she overcomes adversity, controls it, and achieves her goals and ambitions. Hair symbolizes Smooth hair indicates the dreamer achieving stability and happiness in reality, and the emergence of a relationship in the near future, such as marriage, and changing her circumstances for the better. Long hair in the dreamer expresses the benefits and good things that she will obtain, and if she sees that her hair is long, unlike reality, this indicates worries and misfortunes that You will face her. Long brown hair in a single woman’s dream. This vision symbolizes the dreamer achieving goals and aspirations

title: Interpretation of eating duck meat in a dream: seeing ducks in a dream

preview.html: A dream about duck meat for single women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men, whether cooking duck meat, eating white or black goose meat, slaughtering ducks, or buying ducks from the market, according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and others. Ducks in a dream are strange dreams that greatly indicate the woman in the dreamer’s life. Ducks are beautiful dreams that bring us great goodness. Ducks are beautiful birds in life, and many people raise them at home at a turn or turn. To benefit from its benefits, and many people are very fond of eating ducks in public life because of the great benefits that ducks contain. Interpretation of duck meat in a dream Seeing duck meat in a dream indicates money and blessings An unmarried woman eating duck meat in a dream is a sign of good things that will come to her in the near future. A married woman who eats duck meat in a dream is a sign of following a wide diet and a positive change in her life. Duck in a dream has a large number of important meanings and connotations that a person must pay attention to, as it comes in a dream in different forms, which the great interpreter Al-Nabulsi explained to us in his interpretations. Interpretation of ducks in a dream Seeing ducks in a dream is evidence of the presence of a maid or a woman that a person knows in public life. Dreaming of ducks in a dream is evidence of a man who enjoys great purity. If he sees ducks in a dream, this is a sign of the honor of a woman in the dreamer's life. Interpretation of eating ducks in a dream Eating ducks in a dream is a sign of wealth and abundance of money coming to the dreamer. Eating ducks in a man's dream also indicates that he will soon be blessed with a beautiful woman. Seeing ducks in a dream means that a person works in a profession on the water, such as a fisherman or a sailor. Eating ducks in The dream is a sign of a happy and peaceful life in the dreamer's life. Interpretation of the sound of ducks in a dream Hearing the sound of ducks in a dream is evidence of a person's warning of a problem or disaster in the same place. Interpretation of slaughtering ducks in a dream Slaughtering ducks in the Islamic way in a dream is evidence of the solution Interpretation of a dream about ducks in a dream for a married woman Seeing ducks in a dream is a sign of upcoming changes in life. A duck in a married woman's dream also indicates kindness and living for her and her husband in the near future. Seeing a married duck in a dream means marital happiness and great stability. Ducks indicate the achievement of the dreamer's great. A married woman who sees ducks in a dream is evidence of kindness and abundant nutrition for her. Seeing white ducks in the house of married couples is evidence of great marital happiness between her and her husband. Ducks in a married woman's dream also indicate that her husband loves her very much. A married woman cooking ducks in a dream is evidence of her upcoming work in the near future. A married woman buying ducks in a dream is a sign of goodness and blessings in her life. Interpretation of a dream about ducks in a dream for a single woman An unmarried woman who sees ducks in a dream indicates great ambition, luck and kindness. title: Urinating in a dream is good news

preview.html: Urinating in a dream is sad news, and it is one of the dreams that a person wants to interpret as soon as possible because he is concerned with interpreting this vision, and the interpretation varies from one person to another according to the psychological state of the dreamer. The dream is mostly happy visions that indicate goodness, contrary to what everyone believes, and it can also indicate a person’s liberation from all the debts that fall on him. Urinating in a dream is good news. Seeing urinating in a dream symbolizes the good news that the dreamer will end and get rid of all the problems and crises that he has faced. He goes through it and will change his life for the better, as it shows that this person has huge financial wealth. Which he will get as quickly as possible by inheritance or custody. If someone sees that he is urinating in the toilet, this means that this person can control everything and is characterized by good planning of what he wants. I do. If a person sees himself urinating in a dream, this means that he has overcome all the difficulties that created a big problem for him, making him feel upset, uncomfortable, and unstable in all matters of his life. Ibn Sirin believes that urinating in a dream is evidence of a person’s inability to control his actions in reality, and this person must review all his calculations and stay away from what is ugly and evil until he regains his control over matters. But in the case of someone who sees himself urinating in a place and does not know the owners of that place and does not know the location of that place, this indicates that that person’s marriage to a girl who lives in the same place, and seeing her urinating in a dream symbolizes that this person is spending a lot of money on something, but he knows Well, this money returns to him again. According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing a person urinating in a well indicates that this person earns and spends a lot of money in charity, and that he pays the zakat imposed on him regularly. Who will have a high status in society and it is possible that this child will be a scholar, and if one sees that he is urinating on the Holy Qur’an, this indicates that one of this person’s children will be the bearer of the Book of God (memorizing the Qur’an). Urinating in a dream is good news for a single woman’s vision. Urinating in a dream is good news for an unmarried woman, as it indicates the end of all the worries and problems that were standing in front of her and causing her a lot of pain. He is lost and confused in making a certain decision and standing in the middle of the road and does not know where to go and what to do. If an unmarried woman sees that she is urinating on her bed, this indicates that she will soon marry a person who has good qualities, and that she will give birth to good offspring from him, but if she sees that the color of the urine White, and this indicates that God gives her a lot of money that allows her to achieve what she wants, but if the urine comes out bleeding, this indicates that she does not give zakat from her money to the poor, as is evident from the accumulation of debts on her. What is the interpretation of seeing urinating in the toilet in a dream for a single woman? Seeing an unmarried woman urinating in the toilet is a good sign for her, because this dream is a happy and promising vision, as it
